name: Death Must Die (itch)
description:
A warlock tired of dying when facing dungeon monsters, decides to defeat Death once a for all.  Taking a chance everytime he dies. Becoming Stronger with each fight. 

-----------------------------------------------------------

Controls: 

W - Up

A - Left

S - Down

D - Right

Space - Shoot fireballs

------------------------------------------------------------

Theme: Death is an opportunity

Game made for the Game Jam CSIEE, by the team 'Seven Nation Army':

Pixelarts: 

- Nicolás Caminoa

Music: 

- Federico Caminoa

Programming: 

- Ramiro Luengo

- Nicolás Collazo

- Uriel Moreno

- Alexis Delgado

- Emmanuel Ayala
